channel.title: Equipping items doesn't work
channel.description:
Right basically it was working. All my customs equip fine. This wouldnt be a problem as basically every item on my server is a custom (Zombie-scape - Custom guns, Custom Armor etc) But then i realised HOLY SHIT! how are u gonna mine if you cant weild a pickaxe.
Basically You click the item and nothing happens.
Anyone know a fix or where I should look or whatever.
